fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Visit a player each night to determine if they are evil or not.
- In the day, introduce yourself to someone you previously visited, forming an alliance and a private chat with them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role can only spawn with factions that have a factional chat, and only if there's at least one other evil faction in the game.
- Forming an alliance allows your faction to win with your ally, and vice-versa, unless the ally has the NK Goal.
- If you die, all of your alliances will be lost.
- Naturally, members of evil factions will appear evil to you. However, roles with the NK Goal will appear evil to you as well.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Win with the faction you're in as well as any evils you align with.
